title: Looking for a decent/good jungler who can actually gank my lane (I am Plat 2)
body:
I am absolutely sick of getting camped as a mid laner. I do not receive any ganks even though i am not pushed and I buy heaps of wards. I am not oblivious and my map awareness is decent so please if you are platinum or high gold add me.

My Summoner Name is: AttackonOtakus

Thank you
